alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Cumberland (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 06 at 11:48AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southern New Jersey...including the following areas...Atlantic, Atlantic Coastal Cape May, Cape May, Coastal Atlantic, and Cumberland. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain and a few thunderstorms will persist into the afternoon. Rainfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour may lead to flooding of urbanized and low lying areas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Cumberland
